articles.title: The Novel Coronavirus Is Killing More Women Than Men In India, Claims Study - India Times
articles.description: Studies have shown that men are more prone to dying from COVID-19 than women, globally, but a new research claims the complete opposite is happening in India. In India, researchers used crowd-sourced data to provide preliminary estimates for age-sex-specific …
articles.content:
